content.raw:
Actually, it turns out that the issue was that we were not setting the compiler flags properly.  My question is, why do you have:

# Handle CFlags
unset (CMAKE_C_FLAGS_ALL CACHE)
unset (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS CACHE)

This breaks the default method of setting CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS via the CXXFLAGS environment variable.  However -DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO="$CXXFLAGS" appears to work.
